Package ATU_project

Class Team

java.lang.Object
ATU_project.Team
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The class for team with 3 or 4 members of students for the project.
Author:
Yoanna Lo, Ju Jong Ho
See Also:
Student, Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Team

      public Team​(Student leader, Student teammateB, Student teammateC, int id)
      Constructor for Team class consisting of 3 students. Assign students to the team and calculate the team size, average K1 and K2 energy.
      Parameters:
      leader - represents leader student.
      teammateB - represents second student.
      teammateC - represents third student.
      id - represent ID of the team.

    • Team

      public Team​(Student leader, Student teammateB, Student teammateC, Student teammateD, int id)
      Constructor for Team class consisting of 4 students. Assign students to the team and calculate the team size, average K1 and K2 energy.
      Parameters:
      leader - represents leader student.
      teammateB - represents second student.
      teammateC - represents third student.
      teammateD - represents fourth student.
      id - represent ID of the team.

    • contain

      public boolean contain​(java.lang.String name, long sid)
      Methods to check whether there is particular student in the team.
      Parameters:
      name - represents the name of the student to be checked.
      sid - represents the ID of the student to be checked.
      Returns:
      boolean True if there is a student in a team. Otherwise, false.
